ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would recommend it to another student. I'd say the course is a historical perspective on the formation of capitalism in America and then examines institutions today.
The course provides an effective introduction to the ideas underpinning modern capitalism.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It helped further my understanding of the banking sector of the economy and the different ways capitalism has furthered the development of the market economy in the US
The course allowed me to understand concepts and theories underpinning capitalism, which has the potential to enrich my future professional experiences in financial services.
